name: CockFighter
description:
WASD to move player and LEFT CLICK MOUSE to attack. Avoid RED balls and deflect purple balls. You are a frog who is getting revenge on the chicken kingdom for destroying his pond. You arm up and head out, you find a baby chicken who is not harming no one and you are reminded of the losses you experience back at the pond and blinded with rage you attack the chick. Mamma chicken comes out all angered and starts shoot orbs of danger at you deflect them attack the chicken when vulnerable. 

Credit:
